subject: Drug Abuse and Traffic
Basketball
Marijuana
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors decided not to file marijuana possession charges against Indiana Pacers forward Shawne Williams after his arrest this week, but the team suspended him for the first three games of the regular season for poor judgment. The Marion County prosecutor’s office said the police found marijuana in the vehicle Williams was driving, but prosecutors believed they could not prove the drugs belonged to him.
